data.name: OnePasswordDescription
data.value: 从你的 1Password 密码库导入密码

data.name: OnePasswordInstructionsPart1
data.value: 要导入你的 1Password 密码库，你需要将其导出为 CSV 文件。你可以通过在 1Password 8 桌面应用程序（Windows / MacOS / Linux）中登录你的 1Password 账户，进入“文件”菜单并选择“导出”（至 CSV）来完成此操作。

data.name: OnePasswordInstructionsPart2
data.value: 导出文件后，你可以在下方上传。

data.name: BitwardenDescription
data.value: 从你的 Bitwarden 密码库导入密码

data.name: BitwardenInstructionsPart1
data.value: 要导入你的 Bitwarden 密码库，你需要将其导出为 CSV 文件。你可以通过登录你的 Bitwarden 账户，进入“工具”菜单并选择“导出密码库”（至 CSV）来完成此操作。

data.name: BitwardenInstructionsPart2
data.value: 导出文件后，你可以在下方上传。

data.name: LastPassDescription
data.value: 从你的 LastPass 密码库导入密码

data.name: LastPassInstructionsPart1
data.value: 要导入你的 LastPass 密码库，你需要将其导出为 CSV 文件。你可以通过登录你的 LastPass 账户，进入左侧边栏的“高级选项”并选择“导出”>“LastPass CSV 文件”来完成此操作。

data.name: LastPassInstructionsPart2
data.value: 导出文件后，你可以在下方上传。

data.name: ChromeDescription
data.value: Import passwords from your Chrome Password Manager

data.name: ChromeInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your Chrome Password Manager, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by logging into your Chrome browser, going to the 'Settings' menu > 'Password and AutoFill' > 'Google Password Manager'. Then click on 'Export passwords'.

data.name: ChromeInstructionsPart2
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.

data.name: KeePassDescription
data.value: Import passwords from KeePass

data.name: KeePassInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your KeePass vault, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by going to the 'File' menu and selecting 'Export' (to CSV).

data.name: KeePassInstructionsPart2
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.

data.name: GenericCsvDescription
data.value: Import credentials using a template CSV format
data.comment: Description for Generic CSV import service

data.name: GenericCsvInstructionsPart1
data.value: Is the password manager you are using not supported? You can always import your credentials into AliasVault using a generic CSV template format instead.

data.name: GenericCsvStep1
data.value: Download the AliasVault Import CSV

data.name: GenericCsvStep2
data.value: Open it in a spreadsheet program (Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, etc.)

data.name: GenericCsvStep3
data.value: Fill in your credentials (replace the example data)

data.name: GenericCsvStep4
data.value: Save as CSV format and upload it below

data.name: GenericCsvTemplateDownloadError
data.value: Failed to download CSV template. Please try again.
data.comment: Error message for template download failure

data.name: FirefoxDescription
data.value: Import passwords from your Firefox Password Manager

data.name: FirefoxInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your Firefox passwords, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by opening your Firefox browser, going to menu > 'Passwords'. Then click on the menu icon in the top right corner and select 'Export passwords'.

data.name: FirefoxInstructionsPart2
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.

data.name: DashlaneDescription
data.value: Import passwords from your Dashlane account

data.name: DashlaneInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your Dashlane passwords, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by logging into your Dashlane account, going to the 'Account' > 'Settings' menu and selecting 'Export to CSV'.

data.name: DashlaneInstructionsPart2
data.value: Note: the .zip file you download will contain a "credentials.csv" file. You need to unzip the archive first, and then upload the "credentials.csv" CSV file below.

data.name: KeePassXCDescription
data.value: Import passwords from KeePassXC

data.name: KeePassXCInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your KeePassXC vault, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by going to the 'File' menu and selecting 'Export' (to CSV).

data.name: KeePassXCInstructionsPart2
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.

data.name: ProtonPassDescription
data.value: Import passwords from Proton Pass
data.comment: Description for Proton Pass import service

data.name: ProtonPassInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your Proton Pass passwords, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by logging into Proton Pass (web), clicking on the 'Settings' menu > 'Export' > 'File format: CSV'. Then click on 'Export'.

data.name: ProtonPassInstructionsPart2
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.

data.name: StrongboxDescription
data.value: Import passwords from Strongbox

data.name: StrongboxInstructionsPart1
data.value: In order to import your Strongbox vault, you need to export it as a CSV file. You can do this by going to the 'File' menu and selecting 'Export Database' (to CSV).

data.name: StrongboxInstructionsPart2
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.

data.name: AliasVaultDescription
data.value: Import passwords from another AliasVault server or manual back-up

data.name: AliasVaultInstructionsPart1
data.value: If you have a CSV file back-up of your AliasVault database (from a different AliasVault server), you can import it here.

data.name: UploadFileInstructionCommon
data.value: Once you have exported the file, you can upload it below.
